original_text: Early the next day, Saul put his soldiers into three groups. At dawn, they attacked the camp of the Ammonite soldiers. The Israelite soldiers continued to kill the Ammonites until midday. The Ammonite soldiers who were still alive ran away in different directions. Each man ran off by himself.
korean_text: 이튿날 사울이 백성을 삼 대로 나누고 새벽에 적진 한가운데로 들어가서 날이 더울 때까지 암몬 사람들을 치매 남은 자가 다 흩어져서 둘도 함께 한 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: Saul put his soldiers into three groups
sentences.korean_translation: 사울은 그의 군사들을 세 그룹으로 나누었다

sentences.original_text: they attacked the camp of the Ammonite soldiers
The Israelite soldiers continued to kill the Ammonites
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 군사들은 암몬 사람들을 계속해서 죽였다

sentences.original_text: The Ammonite soldiers who were still alive
Each man ran off by himself
